subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: DeMarcus Cousins and Patrick Patterson scored 18 points each and the third-ranked Wildcats became the first team in N.C.A.A. history to reach the 2,000-win plateau.
snippet: DeMarcus Cousins and Patrick Patterson scored 18 points each and the third-ranked Wildcats became the first team in N.C.A.A. history to reach the 2,000-win plateau.
